creator: leslie_lee@outlook.com
text:
Created attachment 31717
About the error.log

The error.log file under folder ..\Apache Software Foundation\Apache2.2\logs\error.log is increased without limitationc, which size exceeds 50GB.
Not a bug, you're responsible for managing your logs.
creator: covener@gmail.com
rbowen@apache.org
text: See also http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/programs/rotatelogs.html for more information about rotating your log flies. Also http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/logs.html#rotation although that could stand to be updated.
